member.name: T:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListDisplayMode
member.summary: A tri-state enum that controls the visibility of portions of the PagedList paging control.

member.name: F:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListDisplayMode.IfNeeded
member.summary: Only render when there is data that makes sense to show (context sensitive).

member.name: M:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.#ctor
member.summary: The default settings render all navigation links and no descriptive text.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.ClassToApplyToFirstListItemInPager
member.summary: Specifies a CSS class to append to the first list item in the pager. If null or whitespace is defined, no additional class is added to first list item in list.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.ClassToApplyToLastListItemInPager
member.summary: Specifies a CSS class to append to the last list item in the pager. If null or whitespace is defined, no additional class is added to last list item in list.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.DelimiterBetweenPageNumbers
member.summary: Text that will appear between each page number. If null or whitespace is specified, no delimiter will be shown.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.Display
member.summary: If set to Always, always renders the paging control. If set to IfNeeded, render the paging control when there is more than one page.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayEllipsesWhenNotShowingAllPageNumbers
member.summary: If true, adds an ellipsis where not all page numbers are being displayed.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayItemSliceAndTotal
member.summary: When true, shows the one-based index of the first and last items on the page, and the total number of items in the list.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToFirstPage
member.summary: If set to Always, render a hyperlink to the first page in the list. If set to IfNeeded, render the hyperlink only when the first page isn't visible in the paging control.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToIndividualPages
member.summary: When true, includes hyperlinks for each page in the list.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToLastPage
member.summary: If set to Always, render a hyperlink to the last page in the list. If set to IfNeeded, render the hyperlink only when the last page isn't visible in the paging control.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToNextPage
member.summary: If set to Always, render a hyperlink to the next page of the list. If set to IfNeeded, render the hyperlink only when there is a next page in the list.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayLinkToPreviousPage
member.summary: If set to Always, render a hyperlink to the previous page of the list. If set to IfNeeded, render the hyperlink only when there is a previous page in the list.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.DisplayPageCountAndCurrentLocation
member.summary: When true, shows the current page number and the total number of pages in the list.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.EllipsesFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display when not all page numbers are displayed at once.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.ItemSliceAndTotalFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display when DisplayItemSliceAndTotal is true. Use {0} to reference the first item on the page, {1} for the last item on the page, and {2} for the total number of items across all pages.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.LiElementClasses
member.summary: CSS Classes to append to every <li> element in the paging control.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToFirstPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to the first page. The one-based index of the page (always 1 in this case) is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToIndividualPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to each individual page. The one-based index of the page is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToLastPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to the last page. The one-based index of the page is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToNextPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to the next page. The one-based index of the page is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.LinkToPreviousPageFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display inside the hyperlink to the previous page. The one-based index of the page is passed into the formatting function - use {0} to reference it.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.MaximumPageNumbersToDisplay
member.summary: The maximum number of page numbers to display. Null displays all page numbers.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.PageCountAndCurrentLocationFormat
member.summary: The pre-formatted text to display when DisplayPageCountAndCurrentLocation is true. Use {0} to reference the current page and {1} to reference the total number of pages.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.UlElementClasses
member.summary: CSSClasses to append to the <ul> element in the paging control.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.Bootstrap4Full
member.summary: Show Page Numbers plus Previous, Next, First and Last links.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.Bootstrap4Minimal
member.summary: Only show Previous and Next links.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.Bootstrap4PageNumbersPlusFirstAndLast
member.summary: Show Page Numbers plus First and Last links.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.Bootstrap4PageNumbersPlusPrevAndNext
member.summary: Show Page Numbers plus Previous and Next links.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.Full
member.summary: Show Page Numbers plus Previous, Next, First and Last links.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.Minimal
member.summary: Only show Previous and Next links.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.PageNumbersPlusFirstAndLast
member.summary: Show Page Numbers plus First and Last links.

member.name: P:ITC.Service.API.Helpers.PagedListRenderOptions.PageNumbersPlusPrevAndNext
member.summary: Show Page Numbers plus Previous and Next links.
